sql.exec: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `isys_jdisc_db` ( `isys_jdisc_db__id` INT ( 10 ) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, `isys_jdisc_db__host` VARCHAR (255) NOT NULL, `isys_jdisc_db__port` INT ( 10 ) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `isys_jdisc_db__database` VARCHAR (255) NOT NULL, `isys_jdisc_db__username` VARCHAR (255) NOT NULL, `isys_jdisc_db__password` VARCHAR (255) NOT NULL ) ENGINE = INNODB;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `isys_jdisc_profile` ( `isys_jdisc_profile__id` INT ( 10 ) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, `isys_jdisc_profile__title` VARCHAR( 255 ) NOT NULL, `isys_jdisc_profile__description` TEXT NULL DEFAULT NULL, `isys_jdisc_profile__import_all_software` TINYINT ( 1 ) UNSIGNED NULL DEFAULT NULL, `isys_jdisc_profile__import_all_networks` TINYINT ( 1 ) UNSIGNED NULL DEFAULT NULL ) ENGINE = INNODB;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `isys_jdisc_object_type_assignment` ( `isys_jdisc_object_type_assignment__id` INT ( 10 ) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, `isys_jdisc_object_type_assignment__isys_jdisc_profile__id` INT ( 10 ) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `isys_jdisc_object_type_assignment__jdisc_type` INT ( 10 ) UNSIGNED NULL, `isys_jdisc_object_type_assignment__jdisc_os` INT ( 10 ) UNSIGNED NULL, `isys_jdisc_object_type_assignment__isys_obj_type__id` INT ( 10 ) UNSIGNED NULL ) ENGINE = INNODB;

query.title: Add category selection to JDisc profiles.

sql.exec: ALTER TABLE `isys_jdisc_profile` ADD `isys_jdisc_profile__categories` VARCHAR( 255 ) NOT NULL AFTER `isys_jdisc_profile__description`;

query.title: Add customized object assignments to JDisc profiles.

sql.exec: ALTER TABLE `isys_jdisc_object_type_assignment` ADD `isys_jdisc_object_type_assignment__jdisc_type_customized` VARCHAR( 255 ) NULL AFTER `isys_jdisc_object_type_assignment__jdisc_type`, ADD `isys_jdisc_object_type_assignment__jdisc_os_customized` VARCHAR( 255 ) NULL AFTER `isys_jdisc_object_type_assignment__jdisc_os`

query.title: Define Standard Profile
Adding new field in jdisc configuration

sql.exec: ALTER TABLE isys_jdisc_db ADD isys_jdisc_db__version_check TINYINT(1) NULL DEFAULT NULL;

query.title: Adding field: for port filter

sql.exec: ALTER TABLE isys_jdisc_object_type_assignment ADD isys_jdisc_object_type_assignment__port_filter TEXT NULL DEFAULT NULL;

query.title: Adding field: for port filter type

sql.exec: ALTER TABLE isys_jdisc_object_type_assignment ADD isys_jdisc_object_type_assignment__port_filter_type TEXT NULL DEFAULT NULL;

query.title: Adding field: cluster import

sql.exec: ALTER TABLE isys_jdisc_profile ADD isys_jdisc_profile__import_all_clusters TINYINT ( 1 ) UNSIGNED NULL DEFAULT NULL;

query.title: Adding field: blade chassis connection import

sql.exec: ALTER TABLE isys_jdisc_profile ADD isys_jdisc_profile__import_all_blade_connections TINYINT ( 1 ) UNSIGNED NULL DEFAULT NULL;

query.title: Adding field: default server indicator

sql.exec: ALTER TABLE isys_jdisc_db ADD isys_jdisc_db__default_server TINYINT ( 1 ) UNSIGNED NULL DEFAULT 0; UPDATE isys_jdisc_db SET isys_jdisc_db__default_server = 1;

query.title: Adding field: jdisc server identificator in profile table
Update Standard Profile

sql.exec: UPDATE isys_jdisc_profile SET isys_jdisc_profile__import_all_blade_connections = 1, isys_jdisc_profile__import_all_clusters = 1 WHERE isys_jdisc_profile__title = 'Standard';

query.title: Adding field: jdisc custom attributes identificator in profile table

sql.exec: ALTER TABLE isys_jdisc_profile ADD isys_jdisc_profile__import_custom_attributes TINYINT ( 1 ) UNSIGNED NULL DEFAULT NULL;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `isys_jdisc_ca_type` ( `isys_jdisc_ca_type__id` INT ( 10 ) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, `isys_jdisc_ca_type__title` VARCHAR (255) NOT NULL, `isys_jdisc_ca_type__const` VARCHAR (255) NOT NULL, `isys_jdisc_ca_type__sort` INT(10) UNSIGNED NULL DEFAULT NULL, `isys_jdisc_ca_type__status` INT(10) UNSIGNED NULL DEFAULT 2, `isys_jdisc_ca_type__property` INT(10) UNSIGNED NULL DEFAULT NULL, `isys_jdisc_ca_type__description` TEXT collate utf8_unicode_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
INSERT INTO isys_jdisc_ca_type (isys_jdisc_ca_type__title, isys_jdisc_ca_type__const, isys_jdisc_ca_type__sort, isys_jdisc_ca_type__status, isys_jdisc_ca_type__description) VALUES('LC__CATG__JDISC__CUSTOM_ATTRIBUTES_TYPE__TEXT', 'C__JDISC__CA_TYPE__TEXT', 1, 2, 'Text'), ('LC__CATG__JDISC__CUSTOM_ATTRIBUTES_TYPE__MULTITEXT', 'C__JDISC__CA_TYPE__MULTITEXT', 2, 2, 'Multiline text'), ('LC__CATG__JDISC__CUSTOM_ATTRIBUTES_TYPE__INTEGER', 'C__JDISC__CA_TYPE__INTEGER', 3, 2, 'Integer'), ('LC__CATG__JDISC__CUSTOM_ATTRIBUTES_TYPE__DATE', 'C__JDISC__CA_TYPE__DATE', 4, 2, 'Date'), ('LC__CATG__JDISC__CUSTOM_ATTRIBUTES_TYPE__TIME', 'C__JDISC__CA_TYPE__TIME', 5, 2, 'Time'), ('LC__CATG__JDISC__CUSTOM_ATTRIBUTES_TYPE__ENUMERATION', 'C__JDISC__CA_TYPE__ENUMERATION', 6, 2, 'Enumeration'), ('LC__CATG__JDISC__CUSTOM_ATTRIBUTES_TYPE__CURRENCY', 'C__JDISC__CA_TYPE__CURRENCY', 7, 2, 'Currency'), ('LC__CATG__JDISC__CUSTOM_ATTRIBUTES_TYPE__DOCUMENT', 'C__JDISC__CA_TYPE__DOCUMENT', 8, 2, 'Document');

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `isys_catg_jdisc_ca_list` ( `isys_catg_jdisc_ca_list__id` INT ( 10 ) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, `isys_catg_jdisc_ca_list__isys_obj__id` INT ( 10 ) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `isys_catg_jdisc_ca_list__title` VARCHAR (255) NOT NULL, `isys_catg_jdisc_ca_list__content` TEXT collate utf8_unicode_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL, `isys_catg_jdisc_ca_list__folder` VARCHAR (255) NOT NULL, `isys_catg_jdisc_ca_list__isys_jdisc_ca_type__id` INT ( 10 ) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `isys_catg_jdisc_ca_list__status` INT(10) UNSIGNED NULL DEFAULT 2, `isys_catg_jdisc_ca_list__description` TEXT collate utf8_unicode_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
ALTER TABLE `isys_catg_jdisc_ca_list` ADD CONSTRAINT `isys_catg_jdisc_ca_list__isys_obj__id__FK` FOREIGN KEY (`isys_catg_jdisc_ca_list__isys_obj__id`) REFERENCES `isys_obj` (`isys_obj__id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, ADD CONSTRAINT `isys_catg_jdisc_ca_list__isys_jdisc_ca_type__id__FK` FOREIGN KEY (`isys_catg_jdisc_ca_list__isys_jdisc_ca_type__id`) REFERENCES `isys_jdisc_ca_type` (`isys_jdisc_ca_type__id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE;

query.check: SELECT isysgui_catg__id FROM isysgui_catg WHERE isysgui_catg__const = 'C__CATG__JDISC_CA';

sql.exec: INSERT INTO `isysgui_catg` (`isysgui_catg__id`, `isysgui_catg__isys_tree_group__id`, `isysgui_catg__title`, `isysgui_catg__description`, `isysgui_catg__const`, `isysgui_catg__source_table`, `isysgui_catg__class_name`, `isysgui_catg__sort`, `isysgui_catg__parent`, `isysgui_catg__list_multi_value`, `isysgui_catg__property`, `isysgui_catg__status`, `isysgui_catg__standard`, `isysgui_catg__overview`) VALUES (NULL, NULL, 'LC__CMDB__CATG__JDISC_CUSTOM_ATTRIBUTES', NULL, 'C__CATG__JDISC_CA', 'isys_catg_jdisc_ca', 'isys_cmdb_dao_category_g_jdisc_ca', '5', NULL, '1', '0', '2', '0', '0');

query.title: Adding field: vlan import

sql.exec: ALTER TABLE isys_jdisc_profile ADD isys_jdisc_profile__import_all_vlans TINYINT ( 1 ) UNSIGNED NULL DEFAULT NULL; UPDATE isys_jdisc_profile SET isys_jdisc_profile__import_all_vlans = 1;

sql.exec: ALTER TABLE isys_jdisc_db ADD isys_jdisc_db__discovery_password VARCHAR(255) NULL DEFAULT NULL;

sql.exec: ALTER TABLE isys_jdisc_db ADD isys_jdisc_db__discovery_port INT(10) NULL DEFAULT NULL;

query.title: Adding new field in jdisc configuration

sql.exec: ALTER TABLE isys_jdisc_db ADD isys_jdisc_db__discovery_protocol VARCHAR(255) NULL DEFAULT NULL;

SELECT isysgui_catg__id FROM isysgui_catg WHERE isysgui_catg__const = 'C__CATG__JDISC_DISCOVERY';

sql.exec: INSERT INTO `isysgui_catg` (`isysgui_catg__id` ,`isysgui_catg__isys_tree_group__id`, `isysgui_catg__title`, `isysgui_catg__description`, `isysgui_catg__const`, `isysgui_catg__source_table`, `isysgui_catg__class_name`, `isysgui_catg__sort`, `isysgui_catg__parent`, `isysgui_catg__list_multi_value`, `isysgui_catg__property`, `isysgui_catg__status`, `isysgui_catg__standard`, `isysgui_catg__overview`) VALUES (NULL, NULL, 'LC__CMDB__CATG__JDISC_DISCOVERY', NULL, 'C__CATG__JDISC_DISCOVERY', 'isys_catg_virtual', 'isys_cmdb_dao_category_g_jdisc_discovery', '5', NULL, '0', '0', '2', '0', '0');

CREATE TABLE `isys_jdisc_device_type` ( `isys_jdisc_device_type__id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `isys_jdisc_device_type__title` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `isys_jdisc_device_type__description` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `isys_jdisc_device_type__const` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `isys_jdisc_device_type__sort` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `isys_jdisc_device_type__status` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT 2, `isys_jdisc_device_type__property` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`isys_jdisc_device_type__id`), KEY `isys_jdisc_device_type__title` (`isys_jdisc_device_type__title`), KEY `isys_jdisc_device_type__const` (`isys_jdisc_device_type__const`), KEY `isys_jdisc_device_type__status` (`isys_jdisc_device_type__status`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;

sql.exec: ALTER TABLE isys_jdisc_profile ADD isys_jdisc_profile__import_software_licences TINYINT(1) UNSIGNED NULL DEFAULT NULL;
